content: heat wave ankle warmers skill level easy size one size stretches to fit approx 10 long x 9 circ at narrowest point 11 circ at widest point unstretched ankle warmers will stretch up to 11 circ at narrowest point 15 circ at widest point materials 200 yds worsted wt 4 yarn size j/10 6 mm crochet hook or size needed to achieve gauge tapestry needle gauge 11 sts & 13 row = 4 in single_crochet on size j/10 6 mm hook pattern notes ankle warmers are worked lengthwise ribbed fabric is achieved by working in back loop only blo on every row terms/abbreviations back loop only blo beginning beg chain chain circumference circ half_double_crochet half_double_crochet hook hk remaining rem repeat repeat single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch stitch st yarn over yo 1 ankle warmers make 2 row 1 rs chain 35 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hk and in next 5 chain *half_double_crochet in next 8 chain single_crochet in next 6 chain repeat from * once turn 34 sts note on row 2 and all following row work in back loop only blo row 2 chain 1 single_crochet in blo of first single_crochet and in next 5 single_crochet *half_double_crochet in blo of next 8 single_crochet single_crochet in blo of next 6 single_crochet repeat from * once turn row 3-20 repeat row 2 at end of row 20 do not cut yarn finishing fold piece with right sides together working through both thicknesses slip_stitch in ea st across forming a seam fasten_off and weave in tails turn piece right side out make second ankle warmer same as first copyright 2017 2011 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 2
